summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East Columbia Street, from 12th Avenue to 13th Avenue; East Cherry Street, from 11th Avenue to 13th Avenue; and East James Street and Barclay Court, each from 12th Avenue to 13th Avenue; all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6863 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
